nodes.text: A Line in the Sand... is a Star Wars Miniatures Battles scenario included in West End Games' April 1997 boxed set Mos Eisley Adventure Set. It includes a map and punch-out paper miniatures. It takes place immediately after Jabba's death in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi as Prefect Eugene Talmont tries to escape Mos Eisley.

Mos Eisley is in chaos after the death of Jabba the Hutt's death. After it is revealed that Prefect Eugene Talmont worked with swoop gangs in order to apply martial law, he tries to escape with the Empire before the Tatooine militia can arrest him.
The scenario is built for three players, one for each of the factions. It can end with Prefect Talmont's escape, capture, or death.
